Educational Qualifications: M.A., B.L. Educated at Sri Venkateswara University and Sri Krishnadevaraya University, Anantapur,Andhra Pradesh
Other Information: Chairman, (i) Government Junior College Students` Union, Anantapur, 1973; and (ii) Sri Krishnadevaraya University, Anantapur, 1979; Director, Agricultural Produce Export Development Agency (APEDA); Member, Agricultural and Processed Food Products Export Development Authority
Name: Reddy,Shri Anantha Venkatarami
Positions Held:
1987-96
General-Secretary, District Congress Committee (D.C.C.) Anantapur, Andhra Pradesh

1996
Elected to 11th Lok Sabha

1996-97
Member, Committee on Human Resource Development Member, Consultative Committee, Ministry of Transport

1998
Re-elected to 12th Lok Sabha (2nd term)

1998-1999
Member, Committee on Energy and its Sub-Committee III on Non-Conventional Energy Sources and Atomic Energy Member, Committee on Government Assurances Member, Consultative Committee, Ministry of Chemicals and Fertilizers
Member, Committee on Chemicals & Fertilizers

2004
Re-elected to 14th Lok Sabha (3rd term)
Member, Committee on Subordinate Legislation

5 Aug. 2007
Member, Committee on Chemicals & Fertilizers

2009
Re-elected to 15th Lok Sabha (4th term)

31 Aug. 2009
Member, Committee on Rural Development

23 Sept. 2009
Member, Committee on Subordinate Legislation
